content: I've added a FHIR calendar at http://fhir.org/calendar. Please notify me of anything that should be added to the calendar
you can subscribe to it if you want
also, I've published the FHIR Foundation member's monthly report - see http://www.fhir.org/archive/reports (FHIR Foundation members only)
Does the syncing of the accounts work properly ? I paid to be a FHIR Foundation member by registering on the HL7 website, but I don't seem to able to log in and view the report on fhir.org ..

@David Johnson - I believe that the way the process works is that you create a login on the FHIR Foundation web site, and then that will automatically become a member login once you register through the HL7 web site. But none of you are on my list of 'paid up members' from David J this morning - suggests that there's some issue on the HL7 side...?

I did create an account successfully. I should be recognized as a paid FHIR Foundation member. I was able to get the monthly report... That all did work fine, once I decided to just use the 'create and account' mechanism
yes you do need to do that - create an account on fhir.org. But there's a problem here that we are looking into
a logout/login on the fhir.org community did it for me, @David Johnson is looking into it
so i have now access to the member report, my message was not to clear, sorry
I should be on the list of paid members, too.
yes I think we're getting our ducks in a row now
You bet! I'm just learning Zulip but if anyone has any questions about their account I'm happy to help make sure it's working.
Pretty sure I searched for the above message twice before it sent. :-)
